modName: Elven Armour and weapons in to heavy-daedric Stats
summary: Elven Armour and weapons changed to Heavy Armour plus Daedric stats
descriptionHtml:
This Mod Changes All the Elven equipment (Armour & Weapons) In to heavy Armour plus Daedric Stats. 

Which means all your Elven gear will have the same stats of any daedric Gear and will carry the full Stat even after a full upgrade.

I\'m doing these mods as requested. Also for thoes people who like the looks of light armour over any of the heavy armour but want the protection that heavy armour offers over Light Armour.

Installation - Extract the file with your choice of file extractor and place the .esp file in to your DATA folder
author: CptKlink
